en: His name is known to everyone in the town.
ko: 이 동네 사람들은 다 걔 이름을 알아.

en: He has a few friends in this town.
ko: 걔 이 동네에 친구 몇 명 있어.

en: He has a great attachment to this town.
ko: 걔 이 동네에 애착이 엄청 커.

en: People say that he is the richest man in this town.
ko: 사람들이 그러는데 걔가 이 동네에서 제일 부자래.

en: He is richer than anyone else in this town.
He is richer than anyone else in this town is.
ko: 걔가 이 동네 그 누구보다 돈이 많아.

en: He disappeared from this town.
He has taken much pains in this work.
ko: 걔 이 일 하느라 고생 엄청 했어.

en: He's a student at this college.
He is fatter than when I last saw him.
He has done better than last time.
He has been sick since last Sunday.
He didn't come to the last meeting.
He played golf last Sunday.
